title: How to increase my ebook downloads - Quora

response.answer_text: If you would like your ebook to be permanently free on Amazon, first publish it on Smashwords and price it free. A few days later, after you've been accepted into their premium catalog, your ebook will show up on www.bn.com as free. Once you see it there, email Amazon via your KDP dashboard and ask them to list your book for free because it's listed on B&N as free. They'll reply within a day or two.
